meanings.definition: An event that fails to occur or that is insignificant or unimportant.
meanings.sent1: The planned picnic turned out to be a nonevent due to the rain.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was a nonevent as nothing important was discussed.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party without cake was a nonevent to the kids.
meanings.sent4: The concert without the main singer felt like a nonevent.
meanings.sent5: The science fair without any projects was a complete nonevent.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is not noteworthy or memorable.
meanings.sent1: The background character in the movie was a nonevent.
meanings.sent2: The plain white wall was a nonevent in the room's decor.
meanings.sent3: The generic brand of cereal was a nonevent compared to the others.
meanings.sent4: The old rock in the garden was a nonevent until it turned out to be a gemstone.
meanings.sent5: The small plant in the corner was a nonevent until it bloomed into a beautiful flower.
